func_sig.description: Calculate the square root of a given number and return it in decimal format.
func_sig.name: calculate_square_root

number.description: The number for which to calculate the square root.

func_sig.description: Calculate the probability based on favorable outcomes and total outcomes.
func_sig.name: calculate_probability

output_fraction.description: Indicate whether the output should be in fractional form.

func_sig.description: Calculate the result of a fractional arithmetic expression.
func_sig.name: calculate_fractional_expression

func_sig.description: Calculate the area of a right triangle given the lengths of the two legs.
func_sig.name: calculate_area_of_right_triangle

func_sig.description: Calculate and return all angles of a pentagon based on angle relationships.
func_sig.name: calculate_pentagon_angle_measurements

angles.description: A dictionary containing the measures of angles A, B and additional_angle.
